title: Deadpool Themed Shen Skin

embed.description: Not too much is known about Deadpool's childhood. At some point of his life, Wade Wilson joined Project X. Little is known of Wilson's subsequent mercenary activities. At one point he was active in Tangier, Morocco where he romanced a woman named Francie.

body:
This was a thought I had after seeing a Deadpool statue at EB Games as it had the same posture as shen, same general outfit and also dual wielded ninjatos, it would be pretty fun to have either a Deadpool or Deathstroke themed {{champion:98}} skin I know there are copyright issues but they managed to pull off scorpion and subzero shen pretty well which are better known respectively as Yellow Jacket Shen and Frozen Shen, If Rito were to make Deadpool Shen I WOULD LOVE IT if they had his lines be like Deadpool; sass and quirky and making people laugh, a funny one liner and such when he ults it'll be pretty cool in my opinion as its a nice difference to the stark silent Shen theme going around seeing as Shen and other champions have pretty lukewarm and basic lines (cough {{champion:12}}  cough) I hope Riot isn't too {{summoner:3}} with already going around ideas and hope if this is given a try/review.
TL;DR: New Shen skin with sassy attitudinized lines and funny one liners themed like Deadpool.
Also for those who don't know Deadpool here are some of his moments: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_hsLE34py2c

replies.body:
"Oh no you found my greatest weakness! Overplayed champions!"
After killing a player "Add one to the creep count"
Deadpool just simply has to smash the 4th wall.

Movement quotes:
"Hey! I get it I get it!"
"JEEZus! You only have to click once!"
"Alright, alright..."
"Do you want me to go there? Or there? ... Make up your mind!"

Didnt see yellow jacket shen and frozen shen part of the paragraph? im not saying a exact deadpool shen im saying a deadpool themed one like how they did subzero and scorpion with yellow jacket shen and frozen shen.
HAHA great quote ideas suffocator and kJs
